text: In his address, the Premier assured fullest support from Sri Lanka to the efforts taken by all states in achieving Sustainable Development Goals.Subsequent to his address, the Commonwealth Secretary-General Patricia Scotland, who met with the Prime Minister, conveyed her wishes to him.Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe yesterday (5th June) addressed the United Nations Ocean Conference being held in New York from 5th  9th June. In his address, the Premier assured fullest support from Sri Lanka to the efforts taken by all states in achieving Sustainable Development Goals.Subsequent to his address, the Commonwealth Secretary-General Patricia Scotland, who met with the Prime Minister, conveyed her wishes to him.
title: PM addresses UN Ocean Conference
